snippet: A day after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu criticized the Obama administration over Iran, Israelis were sympathetic to Mr. Netanyahu even as they mulled the possible damage to ties with the White House.
abstract: Israelis are sympathetic to Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu even as they mull the possible damage to ties with the US after Netanyahu bluntly criticized the Obama administration over Iran; many in Israel support Netanyahu’s demand for firm assurances, as they oppose the idea of a go-it-alone strike on Iran’s nuclear facilities, but are disturbed by the public way in which the dialogue has been conducted.
lead_paragraph: A day after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu criticized the Obama administration over Iran, Israelis were sympathetic to Mr. Netanyahu even as they mulled the possible damage to ties with the White House.

headline.seo: Netanyahu’s Comments Cause Stir in Israel
headline.main: Israelis Fear Fallout From Netanyahu’s Blunt Comments
headline.print_headline: Israelis Fear Fallout From Netanyahu’s Blunt Comments
